original: Alen, Johan, redaktör, Lidköping, f. 1/11/73 i Östervåla, Västmanl. 1. G. 39 m. Elsa Sköld. — Anst. på aff :kon-tor en följd av år, isekr. i KFUM ett par år, tillf, medarb. i Gefle Dagbl., lokalred. f. Hvetlanda-Po’Sten 07, red. o. ansv. utg. av Jönköp. Läns Tidn. 11-12, medarb. i Gbgs-Posten 12-14, red. av tidn. BdlHngen i Skövde 14, red. i Mariestads Länstidn. 15-17, red. av tidn. Västergötl. i Falköp. 18, av Nya Lidköp.-Tidn. 18-42. Led. av -stads-fullm. (fp.) 27-42, lokalstyr. f. sam-reaisk. ised. 29, folksk :styr. 28-43, kyrkofullm. sed. 32, kyrkoråd sed. 33, v. ordf. i nykterh :ndn 32-40, ordf. i Lid- köp. stads peiis :kassa ’sed. 30, fd. v. ordf. i Skara’b. valkret-sförb. av Folkpart., fd. led. av s-tyr. f. Skarab. läns frisinn. valkretsförb. m. m. Medl. av Pubhklubben 34-39. Skr.: bidra-g t. Lidköp. stads hist. m. m.
translated: Alen, Johan, editor, Lidköping, b. 1/11/73 in Östervåla, Västmanl. Married in 1939 to Elsa Sköld. Worked in a business office for several years, a member of the YMCA for a couple of years, occasional contributor to Gefle Dagbl., local editor for Hvetlanda-Po'Sten in 1907, editor and responsible publisher of Jönköp. Läns Tidn. in 1911-1912, contributor to Gbgs-Posten in 1912-1914, editor of the newspaper BdlHngen in Skövde in 1914, editor at Mariestads Länstidn. in 1915-1917, editor of the newspaper Västergötl. in Falköping in 1918, and editor of Nya Lidköp.-Tidn. in 1918-1942. He was a member of the city council (fp.) from 1927-1942, local representative for sam-reaisk. in 1929, school board member from 1928-1943, church committee member since 1932, church council member since 1933, vice chairman of the temperance union from 1932-1940, chairman of Lidköp. City Police Fund since 1930, former vice chairman of Skara'b. constituency association of People's Party, former member of the board for Skara County Liberal Constituency Association, among others. He was a member of the Public Club from 1934-1939 and wrote contributions to Lidköping city's history, among other things.

structured.name: Johan Alen

affiliation.name: Skara'b. constituency association of People's Party

structured.description: Johan Alen was an editor from Lidköping who worked for various newspapers and was involved in different organizations and associations throughout his life. He also contributed to Lidköping city's history in writing.
